answers.answer: It ***** to be swollen! Drink plenty of water and stay away from salty foods..good luck! I swelled up in my third trimester and thats what they told me..good luck!
thank you. I drink water constantly. so I might need to watch the salty foods haha

Salt will do it big time. Also if your legs do it the most try putting your feet up over your head level. Like lay on the floor and have your feet on the couch, that's always helped me greatly when I had preeclampsia with my first and has helped with the slightest bit of swelling with this one.
I didn't swell up this bad until 3 days ago. I have drunken so much water and elevated my feet as usual. I have a stool under my desk at work. nothing's helping :(
How is your blood pressure? ; swelling can be a sign if preeclampsia
I'm 32 weeks going to be 33 on Friday and my right foot is swollen so bad idk what to do im so scared
I've heard of lemon water that's supposed to help.

question: does anyone know anything that'll help out when your whole body swells up? I have been miserable all day.
title: 36 1/2 weeks pregnant and swollen
